#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair

#define oo 1000000000
#define mod 1000000007

typedef long long ll;
typedef long double ld;


const ll INF64=(ll)(1e18);
const ld EPS=1e-9;
const ld PI=3.1415926535897932384626433832795;

ll dp[234][123][123][4];

ll solve(int b,int n,int p,int z){

   if(p<=0) return 1;  // If more than 100 runs have been scored

   if(b==0)  return 0;

   if(dp[b][n][p][z]!=-1){

      return dp[b][n][p][z];

   }

   ll ans=0;

   if(n!=0){

      ans+=solve(b,n-1,p,z);
      ans+=solve(b,n-1,p-1,z);
      ans+=solve(b,n-1,p-2,z);
      ans+=solve(b,n-1,p-4,z);
      ans+=solve(b,n-1,p-6,z); 
       
   }

   if(b!=0){

      if(z!=2) ans+=solve(b-1,n,p,z+1);
      ans+=solve(b-1,n,p-1,0);
      ans+=solve(b-1,n,p-2,0);
      ans+=solve(b-1,n,p-4,0);
      ans+=solve(b-1,n,p-6,0);
 

   }

   ans%=mod;

   dp[b][n][p][z]=ans;

   return ans;

}

int main(){

 
   int t;

   scanf("%d",&t);

   memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));

   while(t--){

     int b,n;

     scanf("%d %d",&b,&n);

    

     printf("%lld\n",solve(b,n,100,0));

   }

   return 0;
}
